text: Kɨli anɨgenɨgel, bɨ Klays nop gos ma nɨgup ak, bin Klays yɨl mɨdeb ak ayɨp dɨ mɨdebil ak nɨm, God bɨ anɨb ak nop gek bɨ suŋtep ne yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Pen bin Klays nop gos ma nɨgup ak, nɨgɨmɨl Klays yɨl mɨdeb ak ayɨp dɨ mɨdebil ak nɨm, God bin anɨb ak nop gek bin suŋtep ne yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Kɨli pen anɨb ma genɨgel, God nɨgek ñɨpay kɨli okok gach sek mɨdebal. Ak pen genɨgel, takaw ma mɨdeb God ñɨpay kɨlop dɨnɨmuŋ tek nep yenɨgab.
